questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE productName REGEXP 'Ford'
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE productName REGEXP '[Ss]hip$'

questions.text: Report the number of customers in Denmark, Norway, and Sweden.
questions.solution_query: SELECT country, COUNT(*) FROM Customers WHERE country REGEXP 'Denmark|Norway|Sweden' GROUP BY country

questions.text: What are the products with a product code in the range S700_1000 toS700_1499?
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE productCode REGEXP 'S700_1[0-4][0-9]{2}'

questions.text: Which customers have a digit in their name?
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customerName REGEXP '[0-9]'

questions.text: List the names of employees called Dianne or Diane.
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE firstName REGEXP 'Dian'

questions.text: List the products containing ship or boat in their product name.
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE productName REGEXP 'ship|boat|Ship|Boat'

questions.text: List the products with a product code beginning with S700.
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Products WHERE productCode REGEXP '^S700'

questions.text: List the names of employees called Larry or Barry.
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE firstName REGEXP '[BL]arry'

questions.text: List the names of employees with non-alphabetic characters in their names.
questions.solution_query: SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE firstName REGEXP '[^a-z|A-Z]'

questions.text: List the vendors whose name ends in Diecast
questions.solution_query: SELECT DISTINCT(productVendor) FROM Products WHERE productVendor REGEXP 'Diecast$'
